text: Leave Me to deal with him whom I created wa-man khalaqtu is a supplement to the direct object or it is an object of accompaniment lonely wahīdan is a circumstantial qualifier referring to the man ‘whom’ or to the pronoun referring to it but omitted from khalaqtu sc. khalaqtuhu alone without family or wealth — this was al-Walīd b. al-Mughīra al-Makhzūmī —
